item.title: Digital Circuit Design Final Revision Tutorial
item.description: Introduction I made this material as a final review note for QMUL Module EBU4202: Digital Circuit Design. It covers key points and some most difficult parts from Teaching Block1â€”â€”Block3. Block4 is not included due to time limit. Tutorial I hosted and ran the tutorial on June 11, 2024 from 7:30 PM to 9:30 PM to help BUPT-QMUL students review the course Digital Circuit Design. The tutorial was for students from two majors, which are Intelligence Science and Technology and Electronic Information Engineering.

About Me ğŸ‘‹ I am currently an undergraduate student, majoring in Intelligence Science and Technology, in the Joint Programme at Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications(BUPT)ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ and Queen Mary University of London(QMUL)ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§. I am also a student member of The Institution of Engineering and Technology(IET). My research interests cover Natural Language Processing. Working Expeirence I am now interning at TsinghuaNLP Lab, Tsinghua University. Before that, I worked as an intern(visiting student) at Deep Learning Lab, Westlake University(Hangzhou, China), from July 2024 to August 2024.

Get in Touch! ğŸ‘‹ Hello there. Expecting the future collaborations and conversations! ğŸ“§ Reach out via email: Email : chenyang.li@se22.qmul.ac.uk ğŸŒ Connect with me online: Looking forward to hearing from you soon! ğŸ“©
